_header: John Bury of care beware I rede thee of Clare
Subjects: scribes; Bury, John, OSA, of Clare, Suffolk
_description: A scribe’s demand for promised payment — one monorhyming quatrain

BLSl3551.Transcription:
John bury off care Be war y rede the off ClareLes þu mysfare now
                    hede þu tak to my lareI can now no mare Of gouernaunce such be þu
                    þareþat oural whare it wel be I desire no mare
BLSl3551.Note:
Similar verses in English (f. 9v), Latin (f. 9v,
                    49) and macaronic (f. 69).
